author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...POTENTIALLY CATASTROPHIC FLOOD AND MUDSLIDE THREAT CONTINUES  OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
summary:
...POTENTIALLY CATASTROPHIC FLOOD AND MUDSLIDE THREAT CONTINUES  OVER PORTIONS OF CENTRAL AMERICA...
 As of 9:00 PM CST Sat Nov 16
 the center of Sara was located near 16.5, -87.3
 with movement WNW at 5 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1001 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Sara (AT4/AL192024)
